name: Kajiri Kamui Kagura: Akebono no Hikari
name_original: Kajiri Kamui Kagura: Akebono no Hikari
description:
Kajiri Kamui Kagura: Akebono no Hikari is an adventure game developed by light. It came out on 25-04-2013. It was published by Light.
Kajiri Kamui Kagura: Akebono no Hikari is available on PS Vita.
